porfolioDesc: This website contain my projects and more information about me.
bankingDesc: Dominican Banking is an app where you can add customer, also add them a new bank account, loan and credit card in the system and make payment and different transaction using a customer.
pokedexDesc: Pokedex is an app where you can add a pokemon with its type and region, delete and edit this pokemon. With beautiful UI Interface.
trailerDesc: FLJJ Movies is an app created using React and Vanilla Javascript where you can watch movie trailers, this app consume an API created with ASP .NET MVC and C#.
marketDesc: EMarket App is like Corotos where people make Advertisements to product and search for people who might be interested in that Product. Using Onion Architecture.
networkDesc: SmartNetwork is an interesting app where you can add friends and make post about your life or something you like.
restaurantDesc: RestaurantAPI is an API to be consume in a Restaurant System. Using Identity and JWT for the Authentication and Authorization.
trailerapiDesc: TrailerMovieAPI is an API to be consume in an App using React and Vanilla JS where you can watch movie trailers.
estateDesc: DR Real Estate is an app where you an agent can publish houses to sell and get a customer in Dominican Republic. The customer also add to favorite the house, finds an Agent or their dream house and can get an Account on the website.
diamondDesc: It's an Mobile app using React Native and Fake JSON API and fetch the music to play in the Phone also you can add them in favorite.
